body:
* #114: accept time periods as values for `downscaler/force-uptime` on namespaces (additionally to `true` and `false` values)
* #118: allow regex patterns for `--exclude-namespaces`

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.5.0 --help

* #113: fix handling of `downscaler/force-uptime` on namespaces (only force uptime if value is `true`)
* #112: do not set `startingDeadlineSeconds` to zero for CronJobs

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.4.4 --help

* #104: retrieve Namespace only once from Kubernetes API
* #105: improve logging and remove unused CLI options (`--exclude-statefulsets`, `--exclude-cronjobs`)

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.4.3 --help

* #101: fix error message when time spec is invalid
* #98: support downscaling of HorizontalPodAutoscaler (HPA) (only for scaling `minReplicas` to >=1)
* #103: refactor code into functions

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.4.2 --help

* #97: ignore invalid timestamps for the `downscaler/exclude-until` annotation and log them as warning

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.4.1 --help

* #94: support new `downscaler/exclude-until` annotation to temporarily exclude deployments from downscaling until a given timestamp

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.4.0 --help

* #93: support downscaling of Stacks with autoscaling (HPA)

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.3.1 --help

* #87: support grace period (`--grace-period`) for updated resources via a custom annotation (`--deployment-time-annotation`) 

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.3.0 --help

* #86: fix UnboundLocalError exception

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.2.0 --help

* #84: allow `Sun-Fri` as weekday range, e.g. for countries where the work week starts on Sunday
* #78: add support for suspending CronJobs

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:20.1.0 --help

* #77: switch to poetry for dependencies and black for code formatting
* dependency updates incl. pykube-ng with IPv6 support

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:19.12.0 --help

* #73: bugfix: use timezone-aware comparison for absolute timestamps

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:19.10.1 --help

* #71: allow absolute ISO timestamps for uptime/downtime

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:19.10.0 --help

* Switch to [Calendar Versioning](http://calver.org)
* #67: fix a bug where downscale/upscale period was not taken into account on resource level

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:19.9.0 --help

* #63: bugfix for situation where downtime-replicas are defined via CLI and via annotation

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.18 --help

* #60: prevent infinite downscaling if `--downscale-replicas` > 0

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.17 --help

This release is a breaking change (with regards to CLI flags): if you used `--kind` before, you now have to use `--include-resources` with a comma separated list of resource types (e.g. "deployments,statefulsets")

* #55: use `--include-resources` option with comma-separated-values instead of `--kind`

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.16 --help

* #54: allow setting downscale replicas via namespace annotation

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.15 --help

* #53: fix downscaling of `Stack` resources

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.14 --help

* #47: `kube-downscaler` now has the option to down/upscale only in certain periods of time (e.g. to downscale every day at ~19:00 and scale up manually). See the [README section on this alternative logic](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler#alternative-logic-based-on-periods).

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.13 --help

* #43: scale resources back up if they have the `downscaler/exclude: true` annotation (@jasongwartz)
* #46: bugfix for hardcoded zero replicas (@jasongwartz)

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.12 --help

* #21: fix a bug when the object (StatefulSet) had no previous annotations
* #39: add `--downtime-replicas` option to overwrite the default of zero

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.11 --help

* #22: support the `downscaler/downtime-replicas` annotation to scale down to an arbitrary number of replicas

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.10 --help

* #36: use [pykube-ng](https://github.com/hjacobs/pykube) as Kubernetes client instead of the abandoned kelproject/pykube project

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.9 --help

* #18: support downscaler annotations on namespace level (allow setting namespace defaults for uptime/downtime) --- thanks to @fbrnc! 

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.8 --help

* #31: fix passing multiple values for the `--kind` option

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.7 --help

* #20: refactor code and support [StackSets](https://github.com/zalando-incubator/stackset-controller)

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.6 --help

* #25: fix weekday calculation for "Pacific/Auckland" :new_zealand:  (weekday should use local timezone, not UTC)

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.5.2 --help

* #16: fix timezone regex pattern to allow "America/Sao_Paulo" :brazil: 

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.5.1 --help

* #15: only scale up once

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.5 --help

* #13: added support for StatefulSets
* #10: add support for `downscaler/force-uptime`

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.4 --help

* #9: do not scale down new deployments within configurable grace period (default: 15 minutes)

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.3 --help

* #8: use stable workloads API version `apps/v1`

Docker image is available on Docker Hub (see [README](https://github.com/hjacobs/kube-downscaler/blob/master/README.rst) on how to use):

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.2 --help

First release.

Docker image as available:

```
docker run -it hjacobs/kube-downscaler:0.1 --help
